info.name: FXChrome like Australis
info.description: Semi-realistic edition. Simple and beautiful, the most joyful and fluid interface for using Firefox (with FXChrome).
info.additionalInfo: Note: Requires FXChrome theme in Firefox. For a better and more personalized, install in place Australion. English: Australis interface for FXChrome, using complements for better and unforgettable experience. Original components are licensed under the Mozilla Public License from Mozilla Addons. Based on a design by Stephen Horlander. Español: La interfaz Australis para FXChrome, usando complementos para una mejor e inolvidable experiencia. Los componentes originales son licenciados bajo la Licencia Pública de Mozilla desde Mozilla Addons. Basado en el diseño de Stephen Horlander. Credits: Australis theme by SoapyHamHocks and Australis-fxchrome style (public domain).
